actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish within the National Cemetery System a national cemetery, of not less than 5,000 acres in size, in the State of Nevada. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of Nevada.
